Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: +1 Hit with weapon attacks

Name: Guardian's Aura
Description:
You gain the Defender's Aura power.
Enemies Marked by you trigger Opportunity Attacks from you when Shifting or violating a Mark.

Name: Guardian's Shield
Description:
Grant (-Con) hit to attacks violating your mark. 
When one or more allies in your Defender Aura are targeted by an attack, as a Free Reaction you grant them (Con) Shield Points

Name: Heavy Armor Specialist
Description: Reduce your Skill Armor Penalty by (Con)

Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: +1 Hit with weapon attacks

Name: Watchman's Challenge
Description:
When you target an enemy with an attack, that enemy is Marked until end of your next turn.
Enemies Marked by you trigger Opportunity Attacks from you when Shifting or violating a Mark.

Name: Watchman's Eye
Description:
Add your Wisdom to your Reaction Modifier. 
Add your Wisdom to the Crit Range of your Reaction attacks.

Name: Watchman's Vigilance
Description: +(Wis) to your Perception and Authority Skills.

Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: +1 Hit with weapon attacks

Name: Sellsword's Ruthlessness
Description: Add your Intelligence to the damage of your Melee and Close attacks.

Name: Sellsword's Valor
Description: When you attack an enemy,that enemy subtracts double your Intelligence to the damage of their Reaction attacks that turn.

Name: Sellsword's Bargaining
Description: +Intelligence to your Authority and Bluff Skills.

Name: Controller Feat
Description: Gain a bonus Feat from the Controller Feat category

Name: Evoker's Barrage
Description:
Add your Dexterity to your Miss Damage.
Add your Dexterity to the range of your Ranged and Area attacks, and to the size of your Line attacks.

Name: Wizard Flexibility
Description: Gain an additional At-Will attack power.

Name: Master Ritualist
Description:
Gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.
You learn an additional Heroic Ritual from each Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Paragon Ritual from each Paragon Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Epic Ritual from each Epic ritual Training lesser feat.

Name: Controller Feat
Description: Gain a bonus Feat from the Controller Feat category.

Name: Controller Feat
Description: Gain a bonus Feat from the Controller Feat category.

Name: Master Summoner
Description:
You treat Body Cover granted to you by your summons and allies as Superior Cover.
Add triple your Charisma to the HP of your Summons.

Name: Wizard Flexibility
Description: Gain an additional At-Will attack power.

Name: Master Ritualist
Description:
Gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.
You learn an additional Heroic Ritual from each Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Paragon Ritual from each Paragon Ritual Training lesser feat.
You learn an additional Epic Ritual from each Epic ritual Training lesser feat.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description:
Add 2d6 damage to Weapon attacks with Advantage made with a Light Weapon. This extra damage is halved on attacks with multiple targets or multiple attack rolls.
Increase the extra damage to +3d6 at level 11, and to +5d6 at level 21.

Name: Scoundrel's Weapon
Description:
You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Crossbows, Slings. 
+1 Hit with Weapon attacks with Recharge weapons and Daggers.

Name: Scoundrel's Ambush
Description:
Add your Charisma to your Initiative.
Gain Advantage when attacking enemies that have not yet acted in the current encounter.
Gain Advantage against Slowed, Immobilized or Grabbed enemies.

Name: Evasive Scoundrel
Description: Add double your Charisma to all defenses against Opportunity Attacks.

Name: Rogue Focus
Description: Gain Skill Focus in a Trained Skill of your choice.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description:
Add 2d6 damage to Weapon attacks with Advantage made with a Light Weapon. This extra damage is halved on attacks with multiple targets or multiple attack rolls.
Increase the extra damage to +3d6 at level 11, and to +5d6 at level 21.

Name: Thug's Weapon
Description:
You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Mace, Light Hammer.
+1 Hit with Weapon attacks with Off-Hand weapons and Maces.

Name: Meathead
Description: Add double your Strength to your HP.

Name: Whack in the Head
Description:
When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy is Dazzled until the end of your next turn.
When attacking Dazzled enemies, you can use Sneak Attack as if you attacked with Advantage, and you gain +Strength Crit Range.

Name: Rogue Focus
Description: Gain Skill Focus in a Trained Skill of your choice.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description:
Add 2d6 damage to Weapon attacks with Advantage made with a Light Weapon. This extra damage is halved on attacks with multiple targets or multiple attack rolls.
Increase the extra damage to +3d6 at level 11, and to +5d6 at level 21.

Name: Duelist's Weapon
Description: You treat Light Blades as Light Weapons.

Name: Duelist's Cunning
Description:
Add your Intelligence to your Reaction Modifier.
While wielding two weapons, you gain a +Intelligence bonus to AC against melee attacks.

Name: Duel
Description:
Gain the Duel power (Minor Action, 1/encounter, Mark adjacent enemy until end of encounter). 
When attacking enemies Marked by you, you can use Sneak Attack as if you attacked with Advantage

Name: Rogue Focus
Description: Gain Skill Focus in a Trained Skill of your choice.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description:
Add 2d6 damage to Weapon attacks with Advantage made with a Light Weapon. This extra damage is halved on attacks with multiple targets or multiple attack rolls.
Increase the extra damage to +3d6 at level 11, and to +5d6 at level 21.

Name: Swashbuckler's Weapon
Description: You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Hand Crossbow.

Name: Swashbuckler's Step
Description:
When you Shift, you can have that movement count as Climbing or as a Long Jump.
When you use the Shift Maneuver, you Shift your Charisma (instead of Shift 1).

Name: High Ground
Description:
When you use the Drop Maneuver, you reduce the falling distance by your Charisma (instead of by 1). If you fall adjacent to an enemy, you gain Advantage against that enemy this turn.
Gain Advantage on melee attacks against enemies on squares at a lower height than your space.

Name: Rogue Focus
Description: Gain Skill Focus in a Trained Skill of your choice.

Name: Healing Word
Description: Gain the Healing Word power.

Name: Faith Healing
Description:
When you use a Healing power, add your Charisma to the Surge Value of any character spending a Surge.
When you heal a character to full health, that character gains Shield Points equal to your Charisma.

Name: Shield of the Gods
Description: Attacks without Advantage made against you or any ally within 3 squares gain -1 Crit Range.

Name: Ritual Training
Description: You gain Ritual Training as a bonus lesser feat.

Name: Rage Strike
Description: You gain the Rage Strike power.

Name: Savage Attack
Description: Your attacks deal +Constitution damage.

Name: Raging Resilience
Description: You add your Constitution to your Surge Value.

Name: Barbarian Charge
Description:
You do not become Hindered due to charging.
When you charge an enemy within 4 or more squares, you gain Advantage, and you can use a Barbarian melee attack instead of a melee Basic attack.

Name: Savage Skill
Description: You add your Constitution to your Intimidate skill and your Nature skill.

Name: Healing Word
Description: Gain the Healing Word power.

Name: Tactical Advice
Description: Allies that can see and hear you gain a bonus to Initiative equal to your Intelligence.

Name: Tactical Action
Description: Allies that can see and hear you gain a bonus to hit with Action Point attacks equal to your Intelligence.
